title: The Top 5 Sales Skills Your Salespeople Must Master

json.text: [MUSIC]
>>BRIAN: Hey, Thanks for your time. We're going to take around one minute
to show you what you'll get with this free offer from
Selling Essentials Rapid Learning Center.
"The Top 5 Skills Your Salespeople Must Master" is a collection
of sales training videos you can use
to help your sales reps become more effective sellers.
Now, It covers five core skills:
Cold Calling
Discovery
Presentations
Price Objections
And overcoming buyer purchase anxiety.
Now, Each video is less than 10 minutes long and
great for sales meeting starters and refresher training.
Simply click the play button and the program will run automatically.
Why are we giving you access to all of this stuff for free?
Because this is best way we know to introduce you to Selling Essentials Rapid Learning Center.
"The Top 5 Skills Your Salespeople Must Master" is part of comprehensive library of
sales training materials â€“ and you'll have access to it all.
After you've checked out the five programs, go ahead and click on the HOME link
in the top navigation bar and take a look around.
A great place to start is to do a topic search
and see what's there for you.
We hope you benefit from these programs
and your free access to the Selling Essentials Rapid Learning Center.
Thanks for your time.
[MUSIC]
Visit http://rapidlearninginstitute.com/selling-techniques/top-5-sales-skills/ for more info
